comments: she may be a good professor but she makes the class difficult. she makes you do unnecessary work. She also is very strict,talks about her family a lot avoid her class

If you see her name on your schedule, go to the Dean\'s office and change the class. She\'s rude, inconsiderate, and thinks she better than everyone else. She writes so much on your papers with red pen that you\'ll think paper has actually started to bleed.

Monte tends to repeat herself and also thinks she\'s the best professor alive. Gives grammar quizzes, 5 essays all varying in length, and one group presentation. I can promise you you wont get a good grade unless she likes you. Extremely rude and inconsiderate.
does not explain information well and can be very snotty
she is very rude and passive aggressive. she also gives out a lot of usless homwwork AVOID
She is rude and condescending. She is completely unhelpful and does not help our writing at all. One phrase: C U Next Tuesday.

Do every thing you possibly can to stay out of this womans class, shes nasty, unhelpful, and gives a ridiculous amount of pointless homework every single night in addition to the papers you have to write. she thinks she makes you a better writer...hah.
